description.value: You can add a crystalline additive to an alchemical bomb to have it undermine your enemy. Choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard], or a â€“5-foot status penalty to Speeds. If the attack with the bomb hits, in addition to the bomb's normal effects, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classDC.value)] saving throw or take that effect until the start of your next turn. Use your class DC for this saving throw, even if someone else throws the bomb.

rules.text: If your bomb hits, the target must succed at a Fortitude save against your Class DC, or suffer one of the following @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Debilitating Bomb]{effects}
